name: lil' fishy
description:
🐟 🐟 cowboys? 🐟 🐟

lil' fishy is a cowboy point-and-click adventure! you've just rolled up to the town of Little Rock looking to lock up your most recent bounty, only to find the jail's already occupied and things are... weird? with the next town two weeks away, it's time to search for some clues and solve what's up with the townsfolk.

🐟 🐟 cowboys!🐟 🐟
